| Event                          | Description                             | Type                                                   |
| ------------------------------ | --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| `sds-accordion-item-collapsed` | Emitted when the accordion is collapsed | `CustomEvent<CustomEvent<Record<PropertyKey, never>>>` |
| `sds-accordion-item-expanded`  | Emitted when the accordion is expanded  | `CustomEvent<CustomEvent<Record<PropertyKey, never>>>` |
